selections.name: Spot The Aussie
selections.reason: Clear top pick. Proven at this distance and handles the wet (2nd on Heavy last start). Vandyke/Thompson combination is elite at this track. Drawn perfectly to control the race.

selections.name: Isla Delilah
selections.reason: Improving filly who ran a solid 3rd over 1600m last start. The step up to 1800m looks suitable and the Munce stable is in form.

selections.name: Exodini
selections.reason: Coming off a 5th on the Polytrack but previous form at Grafton was decent. Should be competitive in this field.

selections.name: Rocking Frocks
selections.reason: Finished 5th at this track last start. Needs to improve but has place claims in a thin field.

danger_horse.name: Isla Delilah
danger_horse.reason: Progressive type who could relish the extra distance.

selections.name: Admitted
selections.reason: Resumed with a solid 4th in a BM70 at Ipswich. Drops back to Class 3 here and should strip fitter. Drawn well.

selections.name: Bruckheimer
selections.reason: Resuming. Won a Class 2 at Ipswich before the break. Good fresh record and Campton stable is striking well.

selections.name: Humphree Bear
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track and distance on Feb 1. In form and handles the conditions.

selections.name: Star Rapper
selections.reason: Resuming off a trial win. Watch the market moves.

danger_horse.name: Bruckheimer
danger_horse.reason: Class runner resuming with good stats.

selections.name: Conformity
selections.reason: Tony Gollan runner who finished 2nd at Eagle Farm (Metro) last start. That form line is superior to this Provincial maiden field.

selections.name: Glaciele
selections.reason: Showed good speed to run 2nd fresh at Ipswich. Will need to overcome the wide gate but has the pace to do so.

selections.name: No Idea
selections.reason: Debutant for Billy Healey. Won a barrier trial at this track. Respect the stable.

selections.name: Cliodhna Maeve
selections.reason: Consistent placegetter. 2nd at Beaudesert last start. Should be in the mix again.

danger_horse.name: Glaciele
danger_horse.reason: Fast horse, if he crosses from the wide gate he will be hard to catch.

selections.name: Rusty Tycoon
selections.reason: Placed at Doomben (Metro) last start over the mile. Drops back to Provincial grade. Looks the one to beat.

selections.name: Fifty Calibre
selections.reason: Ran a credible 4th at Eagle Farm last start. The wide barrier is a slight concern but the form stacks up.

selections.name: Amelioration
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at this track and distance two starts back. Drawn to get a soft run.

selections.name: Fabs Cuz
selections.reason: Placed at Ipswich last start. Consistent enough to figure in the placings.

danger_horse.name: Fifty Calibre
danger_horse.reason: Metro form is strong, just needs luck from the gate.

selections.name: Redford
selections.reason: Stuart Kendrick runner on home track. 5th in an Open at Eagle Farm last start and won a Class 6 prior. Ideally drawn.

selections.name: Tonneofgrit
selections.reason: Ran a strong 3rd in an Open Handicap at Eagle Farm last start. Carries a light weight (121lbs) and is in peak form.

selections.name: Sir Carter
selections.reason: Won the $350k Quality at Gold Coast two starts back. Failed in BM78 last time but bounces back here.

selections.name: Atmosphere
selections.reason: Class runner of the field but carries big weight (132lbs). Will be finishing fast.

danger_horse.name: Tonneofgrit
danger_horse.reason: Weight advantage and recent Metro placing make him a major threat.

selections.name: Jenni Moreese
selections.reason: Massive class drop. Finished 2nd in a Metro BM68 last start, now drops to a Provincial BM60. Even with weight, she should be too good.

selections.name: Family Of League
selections.reason: Loves the wet track and ran 2nd in a Class 3 here last start. The main danger if the track is chopping up.

selections.name: Medical Autocrat
selections.reason: Stablemate to the top pick. Also dropping from BM68 grade where he ran 3rd. Must be respected.

selections.name: Poutchek
selections.reason: Heathcote runner who handles wet ground. 4th in a Class 1 on Heavy last start.

selections.name: Joy A Plenty
selections.reason: Won at this track and grade last start. Drawn well and retains good form.

selections.name: Midnight Drifter
selections.reason: Resuming for the Heinrich stable. Won a recent trial and has good fresh stats.

selections.name: Big Boy George
selections.reason: Drops from Metro BM70 grade. Drawn softly and should be competitive in this easier assignment.

selections.name: Colleano
selections.reason: Resuming winner of a trial. Hoysted stable is dangerous.

danger_horse.name: Midnight Drifter
danger_horse.reason: Trial winner from a good yard.

selections.name: Silver Smash
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from a Metro 3YO race. Won her maiden at this track prior. Looks well placed.

selections.name: Fayetta
selections.reason: Another dropping from Metro grade (BM65). Form is better than it looks on paper.

selections.name: Sir Maurice
selections.reason: Consistent type. Placed on Poly last start. Wide gate is the issue but has ability.

selections.name: Sailor's Rum
selections.reason: Resuming. Has won fresh before and drawn to get a good run.
